pages.title: Rice Paddy Snake
pages.text: The rice paddy snake or plumbeous water snake ($(o)Hypsiscopus plumbea$()) is a species of mildly venomous, rear-fanged snake endemic to South Asia.

pages.title: Rice Paddy Snake
pages.text: Relative Size: ★★☆☆☆$(br2)Always active$(br2)1 Colors$(br2)Favourite Food: minecraft:rabbit$(br2)Number of Offspring: 4$(br2)Growth time: 6 Days
